featured.text: In the health food stores of major cities, it is now possible to buy tofu burgers and even tofu hot dogs.
Health-conscious Americans are adding tofu, the most popular soybean product, to salads and using it as a meat substitute.
According to the passage, which of the following statements is true? (A) Tofu is a rich protein source.

definition.zh_def: 豆腐是一種由大豆製成的食品，通常呈白色，質地柔軟，富含蛋白質。
definition.en_def: Tofu is a food made from soybeans, typically white, soft in texture, and rich in protein.
definition.example: I added tofu to my stir-fry for extra protein.
